title: Mind-Blowing Facts About Space
description:
Join us on an epic journey through the unknown.

This YouTube Short was created using AI-generated content including script and voice narration.

#AIGenerated #YouTubeShorts
script:
Get ready to explore! We're counting down the top secrets of space exploration.

[INTRO MUSIC FADES OUT]

1. The Universe is 93 Billion Light Years Across.
Imagine a cosmic canvas stretching across the fabric of space-time.
scene_descriptions: [INTRO MUSIC FADES OUT, COSMIC BACKGROUND APPEARS WITH A STRETCHING GALAXY]
[ANIMATION OF A GALAXY EXPANDING APPEARS ON-SCREEN WITH COUNTDOWN TEXT '93 BILLION LIGHT YEARS']

beats.text: The Universe is 93 Billion Light Years Across.
